mapper.update: UPDATE stock_producer SET producer_name=#{producer.producerName}, producer_code=#{producer.producerCode}, producer_address=#{producer.producerAddress}, producer_tel=#{producer.producerTel}, producer_person=#{producer.producerPerson}, keywords=#{producer.keywords}, status=#{producer.status}, create_time=#{producer.createTime}, update_time=#{producer.updateTime}, create_by=#{producer.createBy}, update_by=#{producer.updateBy} WHERE producer_id=#{producer.producerId};
